title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) - INITIAL VISIT PACKETForm B7: FUNCTIONAL ASSESSMENT - FUNCTIONAL ACTIVITIES SCALE (FAS[1])
description: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) - INITIAL VISIT PACKETForm B7: FUNCTIONAL ASSESSMENT - FUNCTIONAL ACTIVITIES SCALE (FAS[1])

form_description.title: In the past four weeks, did the subject have difficulty or need help with:

bills.title: 1. Writing checks, paying bills, or balancing a checkbook
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

taxes.title: 2. Assembling tax records, business affairs, or other papers
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

shopping.title: 3. Shopping alone for clothes, household necessities, or groceries
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

games.title: 4. Playing a game of skill such as bridge or chess, working on a hobby
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

stove.title: 5. Heating water, making a cup of coffee, turning off the stove
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

mealprep.title: 6. Preparing a balanced meal
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

events.title: 7. Keeping track of current events
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

payattn.title: 8. Paying attention to and understanding a TV program, book, or magazine
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

remdates.title: 9. Remembering appointments, family occasions, holidays, medications
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

travel.title: 10. Traveling out of the neighborhood, driving, or arranging to take public transportation
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self
